items.value: Game is boring for you? Try to play it with <color=red>f</color><color=yellow>u</color><color=green>n</color> settings to get a lot of fun!
Don't underestimate calculator, with it you can almost instantly answer a question without even knowing it
Use stockfish's chess book for seeing right moves for chess puzzles!
Surrounded by fire during an event? Use any type of BSODA to extinguish it
You can hide from Kulak in any room, he is fully blind

Win the game with as many active fun
settings as possible (use max button)
With no PineDebug, UnityExplorer and KeyCheats
Be tricked by not equal math machine
